name: William McCarthy
what_you_do: William McCarthy founded Dunville Sail Bags, turning used sailboat sails and marine textiles into rugged, stylish bags through upcycling. The company has since closed; he is now pursuing a mechanical engineering degree and focusing on large-scale climate solutions.
social_proof: Recovered over 10,000 pounds of waste; gained traction with Red Bull as a customer; attended over 50 live sales events.
business_focus: Upcycling used sailboat sails and marine textiles into bags (company now closed; founder pivoting to large-scale climate solutions).
service_provided: Upcycled bag manufacturing, in-person retail sales events
